RDP-Classifier
==============

# Available modules


The overview below shows which RDP-Classifier installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using RDP-Classifier, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load RDP-Classifier/2.13-Java-11
```
